sources.title: The Bloody Brood
sources.description: Two beatniks get their kicks by dealing drugs and violence.

sources.title: The Bloody Brood
sources.description: Peter Falk, a drug-dealer who consorts with beatniks, decides that it would be a thrill to murder. The IMDB entry is here .

sources.title: The Bloody Brood (1959)
sources.description: Nico, a drug dealer, murders a telegram messenger-boy "for kicks", egged on by partner-in-crime, TV director Francis. Cliff, the boy's older brother, investigates his death due to the slow progress made by the police. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-bloody-brood-1959/

sources.title: The Bloody Brood (1959) PETER FALK
sources.description:
Movie Class by PizzaFLIX: Peter Falk (1927-2011) had his right eye removed at age three due to cancer. He is best known for his title role in the series Columbo, for which he won four Primetime Emmys and a Golden Globe. His daughter Catherine Falk is a private detective in real life.

Stars: Peter Falk, Jack Betts, Barbara Lord
Director: Julian Roffman

In only his second big-screen appearance, Peter Falk plays a bad beatnik with a fascination for death. Watch it or be square, Daddy-O.

metadata.Plot: Two beatniks get their kicks by dealing drugs and violence.
metadata.Writer: Anne Howard Bailey, Ben Kerner, Elwood Ullman
metadata.Actors: Barbara Lord, Jack Betts, Peter Falk
